name: Astro War
overview: One of Charles F. Gray's first hacks and a chance to tease the cart "experts" in the guise of a long lost work in progress. Not a bad little shooter. The Astrobattle cart shows the Sinmax logo on screen, instead of the Dimax logo. Other versions with a different title: Astro War Astro-War Dead-Ray Kampf im Asteroiden-Gürtel Meteor Defense Missile War Sternen-Kampf Sternkrieg War 2000
